title: New Renovated 3-Bedroom Apartment!!!
neighborhood: Medford, near Assembly Row & Fellsway Plaza!
posting_body: ['Newly renovated 3-bedroom apartment in a fantastic Medford, MA neighborhood!', 'Rent is $3,300/month.', 'Available for 08/15/2022 move-in!', 'ABOUT THE UNIT', 'This is a spacious, sunny, and modern 3-bedroom apartment currently undergoing renovations including new kitchen & bathrooms!', 'The unit features central heating/AC, hardwood floors, an open living room/kitchen, and a granite island counter.', 'Internet/WiFi and water/sewer INCLUDED in rent.', 'Tenants are responsible for electric/gas.', 'In-unit washer/dryer.', 'Plenty of street parking is available, as well as off-street and garage spaces!', 'All bedrooms are large and about the same size, each with large closets and two large windows!', 'REQUIREMENTS', 'All tenants (or their co-signer if student/young professional), must meet the following requirements:', '- First/Last/Security/Broker’s Fee due by move-in', '- Monthly income for the unit must be 3x the monthly rent', '- Must pass background & credit check (600+ credit)', '- Pets are permitted on a case-by-case basis.']
